title: Sabrent 3-Pack Power Lock Suction Hook Hold up to 10 lb [Dual] White (UH-HDW3)
features: Designed for non-porous surfaces, such as glass, fiberglass, tiles, stainless steel, marble, PVC, wood, etc
description: The Sabrent suction hook provides secure placement to non-porous surfaces. Simply push and twist to lock into place for secure adhesion. No mounting hardware is required. Great for coats, handbags, towels, etc. Features: • securely affixes to smooth surfaces • solid construction for reusable use. • designed for non-porous surfaces, such as glass, fiberglass, tiles, stainless steel, marble, PVC, wood, etc. • maximum weight hold up to 10 lb. Instructions: • wipe clean and dry the surface before use • place the hook vertically against a flat smooth surface, with the protruding hook arm 90 degrees to the right (3 o’clock) • then twist clock-wise so the protruding hook arm is now in the south position (6 o’clock). • at this point it should adhere to the surface securely. Package contents • 1 power lock hook (White) warranty: this product comes with a one year warranty.
